pr_title: Use disallowed list instead of blacklist and allow list instead of whitelist

timeline.bodyText: Somehow block list seems a bit different - blocking requests with these headers is what came to mind first. Perhaps FILTERED_*/ ALLOWED_ is a good pattern?
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: It seems like a better idea. 😄
replies.author: heowc

replies.bodyText: DISALLOWED_ also sounds good to me.
replies.author: trustin

timeline.bodyText: There is no verb 'allowlist'. How about: the list of allowed hosts?
timeline.author: trustin
trustin

replies.bodyText: Forbidden also sounds good, but I'm not sure if it's too "strict".
